text:
Example 9.1
For x,θ ∈R the linear regression model in (9.4) describes straight lines
(linear functions), and the parameter θ is the slope of the line. Fig-
ure 9.1(a) shows some example functions for different values of θ.
Linear regression
refers to models that
are linear in the
parameters.
The linear regression model in (9.3)–(9.4) is not only linear in the pa-
rameters, but also linear in the inputs x. Figure 9.1(a) shows examples
